definition: to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: My grandfather and I decided to take a walk around the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 我和爺爺決定去附近繞繞。
